Title: Abhinav Swami | Personal Webpage
Name: Abhinav Swami
Description: Third Year student at BITS Pilani. Passionate about Astronomy and Astrophysics, Open Source Data Analysis and Radio Astronomy
The Good thing About Science is that it's true, whether or not you belive in it. -Neil DeGresse Tyson
AboutContent: I am an Electrical and Electronics major by day, a bird watcher by evening, an Astrophotographer and a Stargazer by midnight.
If you find me somewhere, there will always be a computer nearby.
I am passionate about Astrophysics and Open Source data handling & Gravtitaional Wave Physics.
I am intrested in helping solve real world problems by using my knowledge of Electronics and Computing.
WorkContent: I am currently working with Raman Research Institute to set up a VLBI(Very Large Baseline Interferometery) based SWAN (Sky Watch Array Network) which is a pan India Interferometry based Radio Telescope.
ProjectsStartLine: Some of the side projects I did can be found here :

Projects.name: Simulation of Digital Design Gates using Logisim

CVStartLine: I am always open to collaborations with impactful work. Feel free to reach out if you want to work together :)
